```{r setup}
library(ezGenomeTracks)
```

`ezGenomeTracks` provides functions to interact with `TxDb` objects, map gene ID to symbols and plot genes.

```{r}
library(org.Hs.eg.db)
library(TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene)

txdb <- TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene
```


```{r}
geneRegion <- "chr12:6,534,517-6,538,371"
```
